post_message: By refusing to denounce Donald Trump’s attack on Judge Curiel for the racism it clearly connotes, it shows Senate Republican Leader Mitch McConnell is the poster boy for the Republican spinelessness that allowed Trump to be the Republican nominee for President of the United States.
